attributes.action: request the Queen dissolve Parliament to call an election immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to allow us, citizens and voters, of the United Kingdom our human and legal right to immediately decide on the behaviour and responsibility of our elected representatives.

During such economic troubles and the amount of money that we, taxpayers, are required to pay; can it be fair that everyone in Parliament remain in post without recourse to review of their conduct from their constituents?

Therefore we should have the right for an Election now with all the facts to make a democratic decision on the country's future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
